ELEMENT.HELPER:
Add three to four wiki based links that will appear in the header to the right of the search bar. A finite amount of space is allocated and adding more text than what is allowed will result in cropping (text being cut off). HTML is not allowed. Adding any wiki besides links will end badly.
No need to separate each link with a pipe ( | ) or any other splitter, it's handled.

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Banner: very wide across top of content (A of A/B test) [959 by 35]
ELEMENT.HELPER:
This banner will NOT show up during checkout
This banner is set up for an A/B test. This banner will show up on the A side.

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Banner: very wide across top of content (B of A/B test) [959 by 35]
ELEMENT.HELPER:
This banner will NOT show up during checkout
This banner is set up for an A/B test. This banner will show up on the B side.

ELEMENT.HTML:
<%
/* create a cart var for recent category path.  Used to compare against focus cat safe id to determine what set of subcats should be displayed in the dualmenu_display_focus_subcats SUBCAT element below.  This element needs to be before that one in the TOXML doc. */

print("");

/* the only way to get the top level category is to put the entire category path into a stack and then to retrieve the content of spot 1 (or 1 and 2 if within a specialty store). */
loadurp("SREF::_CWPATH");
	pull(stack=>>$PATHSTACK,format=>"textlist",delimiter=>".",p1=>"TOPCAT",p2=>"SUBCAT");
	pop(stack=>>$PATHSTACK,namespace=>"PATH");

/* check the rootcat to see if it is anything other than .   If a specialty store is in focus, the rootcat will be longer. */
	loadurp("profile:zoovy:site_rootcat"); default(".");

	goto(label=>"SPECSTORE",ne=>".");

/* this is a root level category store, only the top level cat is needed to set in the recent_category_path var */	
	load($PATH.TOPCAT);
	goto(label=>"SET",ne=>"");

/* this is a specialty store. set recent_category_path to two tiers deep. This is a 'most cases' solution */
:SPECSTORE();
	load($PATH.TOPCAT); format(posttext=>".");
	format(posttext=>$PATH.SUBCAT);

:SET();
	element(TYPE=>"SET",SRC=>"CART::RECENT_CATEGORY_TIER1",DATA=>$_);

%>

<% print(""); /* recent category is set in a spel element elsewhere before this element loads. This saves additional lookup to see if cwpath is set */ loadurp("CART::RECENT_CATEGORY_TIER1"); /* only display the subcategories if the recent category is in focus. */ goto(label=>"NOTFOCUS",ne=>$cat_safe); print("
"entity"); print(); print("">"); print($cat_pretty); print("
"); load($cat_safe); default(""); format(pretext=>"NAVCAT::."); pull(stack=>>$CATSTACK,format=>"src",src=>$_); /* proceed only if there are subcategories */ count(stack=>>$CATSTACK); goto(label=>"NOSUBS",lt=>"1"); print("
"); :LOOP(); pop(stack=>>$CATSTACK,namespace=>"CAT"); load($CAT.safe); stop(unless=>$_); print(" "entity"); print(); print("">» "); print($CAT.pretty); print(""); /* keep looping till we have shown all the subcats */ goto(nb=>$CATSTACK,label=>"LOOP"); print("
"); stop(); :NOTFOCUS(); print("
"entity"); print(); print("">"); print($cat_pretty); print("
"); stop(); :NOSUBS(); print(""); %>

ELEMENT.HELPER: Add up to three wiki based links that will appear in the customer service section of the footer. A finite amount of space is allocated and adding more text than what is allowed will result in cropping (text being cut off). HTML is not allowed. Each link will automatically be put on it's own line.

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Short marketing text for newsletter (no html or wiki)
ELEMENT.HELPER: A short piece of text that will appear above the newsletter subscription form in the footer of the website. only 150 characters will be displayed.
This section is designed for payment icons. It has 34px of height allocated and a max of 350px. Adding a user-defined html block here may have negative results.
Sets the category path for use in the breadcrumb element. Only gets skipped on product pages, that way hitting the home or results pages resets the path.

ELEMENT.HTML: Home » <% load($cat_pretty); default(""); print(); %>
ELEMENT.INIT:
<%
/* override the default INI values here. this gets preprocessed.  */
loadurp("CART::RECENT_CATEGORY_PATH"); default($PATH); initset(PATH=>$_);
%>

ELEMENT.HELPER: used to set an id on a div to override page width in CSS

%WRAP_LINK_YOUTUBE% %WRAP_LINK_BLOG% %WRAP_LINK_RSS% %WRAP_LINK_FACEBOOK% %WRAP_LINK_TWITTER%

ELEMENT.HTML:
<% 
/* the following code will output the text which is set in the TEXT element above */
print("");
loadurp("profile:zoovy:wrap_newstext"); default(""); 
format(wiki,title1=>"",/title1=>"",title2=>"",/title2=>"",title3=>"",/title3=>"",listitem=>"",/listitem=>"",list=>"",/list=>"",hardbreak=>""); 
strip(length=>"170");
format(encode=>"entity"); 
print();
%>
